设置参数`trigger`开启不同触发方式对应的菜单模式。.en-us: Set the parameter `trigger` to open the menu mode corresponding to different trigger methods.

设置参数`placement`控制不同的菜单展开方向。.en-us: Set the parameter `placement` to control the direction of the menu expansion.

监听悬浮按钮组菜单模式下的展开状态。.en-us: Listen to the expansion status of the menu mode of the floating button group.
